content.text:
Actually, I think that might be *all* of the source code, which is absolutely tiny compared to Arch Linux. For example, here's `pacman -Syu` since yesterday:

```
Packages (22) at-spi2-atk-2.30.1-1  at-spi2-core-2.30.1-1  ffmpeg-1:4.1.1-2  gst-plugins-good-1.14.4-2  haskell-hledger-lib-1.14-1  hledger-1.14.1-1  hledger-web-1.14-1  imagemagick-7.0.8.32-1
              libmagick-7.0.8.32-1  libsecret-0.18.8-2  libvirt-5.1.0-1  libvpx-1.8.0-1  linux-5.0.arch1-1  linux-docs-5.0.arch1-1  linux-headers-5.0.arch1-1  pavucontrol-1:4.0-1  perf-5.0-1  sshfs-3.5.1-2
              totem-plparser-3.26.3-1  vlc-3.0.6-8  xine-lib-1.2.9-8  youtube-dl-2019.03.01-1

Total Download Size:   149.40 MiB
Total Installed Size:  486.91 MiB
Net Upgrade Size:        8.00 MiB
```

This is a bit large because it includes Linux, but still -- that's a huge download size compared to Gentoo.
